about_the_game:
"Lovey-Dovey Lockdown" is an intensely emotional and artistically atmospheric romantic interactive novel that transports players into a world filled with mystery and romance. This setting collection aims to showcase to readers the captivating game world's character designs, from conceptual sketches to final CG drafts, presenting its rich and diverse aesthetics and design essence.

Character Concept Sketches


In this setting collection, readers will have the opportunity to delve into the design process of the characters in "Lovey-Dovey Lockdown." From initial concept sketches to the final product, each character's design will showcase the creativity and imagination of the designers. These sketches not only depict the development of the characters' appearances but also delve into their personality traits and emotional details.

CG Drafts


This book will showcase the breathtaking CG drafts of "Lovey-Dovey Lockdown," bringing the characters from the game to life before the readers' eyes. These drafts capture the emotional expressions and movements of the characters while also reflecting the mysterious atmosphere and artistic style of the game world.

In-Depth Exploration of Design Philosophy:


In addition to showcasing visual works, this book will delve into the design philosophy and story backgrounds behind each character in "Lovey-Dovey Lockdown."

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning: "Lovey-Dovey Lockdown Artbook" contains Nudity or sexual content.
